channel.title: Moving NPC's
channel.description:
Hey guys, i am trying to move the npc's on my rsps, but when i change the coordinates and compile it and restart the server, it gets nulled. What am i doing wrong?
heres what we have added
[code=java] spawn = 584 2339 3691 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 599 3080 3509 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1039 2340 3687 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1860 2337 3690 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 553 2339 3687 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 682 2343 3690 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 548 2341 3691 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 546 2340 3692 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2536 2341 3687 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2538 2343 3689 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 584 3216 3416 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 599 2337 3689 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 496 3183 3447 0 0 0 0 0 1[/code]

item.title: Moving NPC's
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“RyRyscape, post:5, topic:465348”][quote author=ponqueque link=topic=570377.msg4133049#msg4133049 date=1351367707]
Nope the coder is using the spacebar
[/quote]

You must have one stupid “coder”.[/quote]

Most coders just claim they know how to code, when really, it’s programming… Heh

Read full topic

item.description:

never once used spacebar in my configs…cept between like the equals sign and the id’s and such but who ever uses it throughout the whole thing lolol

item.title: Moving NPC's
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

ponqueque:

Nope the coder is using the spacebar

Use the “Tab” key instead of your Spacebar. Post if you’re still having problems.

item.title: Moving NPC's
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

  1. Configurations don’t need to be compiled.
  2. Are you using the “Tab” key instead of the “Spacebar” key?

Read full topic
